fips: * Schoharie County in New York is covered by two regional commissions but may only receive assistance from one commission in a given fiscal year. Schoharie County has elected not to be eligible for ARC assistance in FY 2026. If your proposed project includes Schoharie County, please coordinate with New York?s State Program Manager to discuss this matter further.
